[DQC.US.0081.9277] The line item concept us-gaap:IncreaseDecreaseInSecuritiesLendingPayable with a value of -195,408,000 is represented as a child of us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities with a value of -186,357,000 in the companies extension taxonomy role 00400 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows. The element us-gaap:IncreaseDecreaseInSecuritiesLendingPayable however, is not represented as a component of us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities in the US-GAAP taxonomies. The US-GAAP taxonomies include us-gaap:IncreaseDecreaseInSecuritiesLendingPayable as a sibling element (or child of that sibling) relative to us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities. Please review the element selection to determine that an appropriate element has been used for the parent element us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities and the child element us-gaap:IncreaseDecreaseInSecuritiesLendingPayable.
The properties of this us-gaap:IncreaseDecreaseInSecuritiesLendingPayable fact are:
Period :2016-01-01 to 2016-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9277 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1056943/000155837019002151/pfis-20181231.xml 61131
